adrFormatAddress: 127 E 110th St, New York, NY 10029-8054, USA

originalText.text: There should be an option to choose 0 stars. Woman who managed the counter and UPS packages is incompetent (unable to use the scanner though I was able to do so with my phone and when I asked her to enter the tracking manually, she said "she wont do that"). She has only ever been rude to me, though my most recent visit will be my last. I have no idea how they stay in business - the shelves are mostly empty and what she does have look like dollar store items being sold for full price. AVOID THIS PLACE.

originalText.text: I have never dealt with such unprofessional, rude, and borderline criminal individuals. Not only was I initially accused of being out of coverage with my insurance: only after I had to organize a three way conference call with my insurance and the pharmacy did they decide to simply not accept my insurance. I paid out of pocket and never received my medication in the mail: unsurprisingly given my interactions with them I am still awaiting a refund. I will soon have to involved the legal authorities. A truly horrendous experience.
